title: Summer Lovers (1982) (Daryl Hannah, Peter Gallagher)
description:
SUMMER LOVERS - 1982

IMDb Rating: 5.1
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0084737/

  Daryl Hannah and Peter Gallagher play a young couple vacationing in Greece when they meet one of the island locals, a gorgeous paleontologist (French actress Valerie Quennessen) who quickly proves that when it comes to love on a Greek island, three is better than two. This innocent flirtation endures a bit of ego-bruising animosity, but suspicion eventually subsides and blossoms into a sensuously delightful menage a trois, accompanied by a soundtrack full of early-'80s pop by Chicago, Elton John, Blondie, the Pointer Sisters, and others. In addition to suggesting an interesting use of candle wax during foreplay it treats viewers to the vision of Ms. Quennessen cavorting topless and bottomless whenever the impulse strikes her (and it strikes her often).

  Starring: Daryl Hannah, Peter Gallagher, Valerie Quennessen, Barbara Rush, Carole Cook.

  Directed by: Randal Kleiser.

  Quality: Very Good Xvid from DVD.

  Length:  1hr. 39min.

  Language: English.

  Size: 640 x  480
